body.name: Wax Candle Melt Warmer Burner - 3-in-1 Ceramic Essential Oil Burner Electric Scented Fragrance Candle Melter for Home Office Bedroom Living Room Decor

features: An Exclusive Design Wax Warmer： This electric wax melt warmer is made of high-quality reinforced ceramic, with smooth lines and a simple and generous design style; light green outlook is fresh and elegant. The glaze is smooth and delicate, which is very ornamental and practical. Our ceramic scented wax melter is an integral part of any modern home, office, gym, spa or studio.

3-in-1 Ceramic Fragrance Burner： Our wax melts burner is removable, when you use the dish, you can add wax blocks or essential oils; When you do not use the dish, you can use candle jars with and without wicks directly on the iron heating plate. And this ceramic fragrance wax warmer can also be used to successfully reduce smoke, garbage, or pet-specific odors.

Easy to Master Ceramic Oil Burner： You just need to plug in the electric wax warmer, put a few wax blocks on the dish, and then turn on the switch, isn't it very simple! As the wax blocks melt, the room slowly fills with fragrance. Cleaning the candle wax melt burner is also very simple, just pour the wax liquid from the dish into the wax block box, wait for it to cool, and you will get a new wax block.

Decorative Electric Candle Wax Warmers： Our electric wax melt warmers are both functional and decorative, the perfect desktop decoration for family living rooms, bedrooms, offices, yoga rooms, spas and more! When you have an essential oil burner, every time you come home it is an elegant olfactory enjoyment, and experiencing the new fragrance life begins with getting a wax melt warmer.

Thoughtful Gift Wax Melt Warmers： Are you still looking for a good and practical gift? Our great ceramic fragrance oil burner is a thoughtful and convenient gift, one that everyone can benefit from. With a combination of style, design and function like that, it's a great hit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works consistently well
reviews.reviewText: I bought this one because I liked the design, and was pleasantly surprised to see that it also works as a coffee warmer! I wish it had an auto shutoff feature but it works well. The base does get hot so keep it away from anything valuable and let it cool before moving

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This warmer is just what I ordered. Compact, really pretty, heats up quickly and looks great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works great for price, I use it in bathroom and is perfect for the size of room

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works well BUT GETS VERY HOT
reviews.reviewText: This wax warmer is cute, has a deep dish and is easy to use. The only thing is it gets VERY hot. I bought this to replace a wax warmer that I cannot find (it was perfect). With that one, the base was still cool, but it melted the wax really well and was comfortable with leaving it on while I wasn’t home. Now, this one on the other hand, the base gets extremely HOT. While it’s good for the wax, I wouldn’t feel comfortable or even safe leaving this unattended. I feel like it’s a little too hot and will burn the wax. I just got it so I’ll will keep a close eye on it . Definitely put it in a safe space and keep an eye on it. Might return it just for a peace of mind and get one that’s not so hot!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Place smells great
reviews.reviewText: I turn it on and within 5 minutes my place smells great! I don’t leave it on long it does the trick quickly. Very happy I got this and it’s cute & smaller so doesn’t take up space or stick out!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Work well. Easy to clean. As advertised.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Not much to say with this except it came in good no nothing broken. All works great... Comes in 2 pieces, made fairly well as long as you don't drop it.. The power cord is only about a foot long with a switch on the cord.. Will likely need an extension cord it your moving it in the house... The unit gets fairly hot to touch for both the burner as well as the plate.. Only one amber light on the unit to let you know it is on.. Does not come with a timer or any other type switch.. Wax seems to melt good... Will see how it works out in 3/6 months...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It works great and looks nice; I just wish the indicator light shine brighter and made neat designs in the wall.
Works very well and does not get too hotMelts wax cubes pretty quick.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 23, 2021
reviews.reviewText: After lots of research into bulbless burners, after accidentally smashing my Scentsy bulb burner, I chose this Bobolyn model. After a few days of use, I must say it's a great little burner. It has nice deep tray with room for several cubes (I prefer one at a time) with handy push button power lead. It does take a little while to heat up, but if you allow good time, it's no problem. Overall, for the price point, it is stylish and functional, with no need for replacement bulbs. It doesn't get overly hot either, but enough heat to burn the wax. 5*.
Works great, it is simple but attractive and not too bulky, can pretty much place it anywhere. Heats well and evenly and allows the wax melts to deliver max warm scent into the room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 13, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Does not work this does not work at all plugged it in light came on and there is no heat so does not melt anything I would like to return this asapI would have loved this to work as I have loads of melts and stones and this has just wasted time and money as it does not heat up at all

I love this burner. It’s small the bowl is easy to remove as it sits on a heater. I found it became hotter than other wax burners I have. It’s not for people with small children as it’s easy to grab or pull hot wax on them. There is no light with this model so it’s excellent for areas that light is not needed. I would not hesitate to purchase more of these to keep or give as gifts. You can buy the replacement bowls so you can swap scents easily without waiting to cool down.
